original_text: And Moses sent them to the war, a thousand from each tribe, together with Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, with the vessels of the sanctuary and the trumpets for the alarm in his hand.
korean_text: 모세가 각 지파에 천 명씩 싸움에 보내되 제사장 엘르아살의 아들 비느하스에게 성소의 기구와 신호 나팔을 들려서 그들과 함께 전쟁에 보내매

sentences.original_text: And Moses sent them to the war
together with Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest
with the vessels of the sanctuary
and the trumpets for the alarm in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에 경고를 위한 나팔들을 가지고
